title.narrative: Mekong Delta Region Urban Upgrading Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to improve infrastructure services in Low Income Areas in the Project Cities in the Mekong Delta Region.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :4.01. | Description :The Additional Conditions of Effectiveness consist of the following:(a) The Recipient'sPrime Minister has approved the Resettlement Policy Framework.(b) Each Project Province has adopted its respective ResettlementAction Plan. | Due Date :09-Aug-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. A.1. | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Ministry of Construction to maintain,throughout the implementation of the Project, a Project Coordination Unit under the direction of qualified management provided withsufficient resources and staffed with competent personnel in adequate numbers (see Financing Agreement for details). | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. A.10. | Description :The Recipient shall cause each Project Province to promptly take allactions as shall be necessary to provide the counterpart funding necessary for implementing the relevant Project City's RespectivePart of the Project in accordance with a schedule of payment plan acceptable to the Association, as said plan may be revised fromtime to time with the prior written agreement of the Association. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. A.2. | Description :The Project Coordination Unit shall establish, by no later thanOctober 30, 2012, a field office to be located in Can Tho City, and shall assign some of the Project Coordination Unit personnelto that office including, among others, the procurement officer, the environment and social safeguard officer, and the qualityassurance officer. | Due Date :30-Oct-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. A.3. | Description :The Recipient shall cause each Project Province to maintain,throughout the implementation of the Project, a Provincial Steering Committee with composition and under terms of referencesatisfactory to the Association to be headed by the chairman or vice chairman of the Provincial People's Committee of therespective Project Province. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. A.4. | Description :The Recipient shall cause each Project City to maintain, throughoutthe implementation of the Project, a Project Management Unit under the direction of qualified management provided with sufficientresources, and staffed with competent personnel in adequate numbers including (See the Financing Agreement for further details). |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. A.8. | Description :The Recipient shall: (a) cause each Project City to carry out itsRespective Part of the Project in accordance with the Project Operations Manual, setting forth guidelines and procedures for theimplementation of the Project and (b) not amend, revise or waive, nor allow to be amended, revised or waived, the provisions ofsaid Project Operations Manual (see Financing Agreement for details). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. B. | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the Project is carried out inaccordance with the provisions of the Anti-Corruption Guidelines | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. C. 1. | Description :The Recipient shall cause each Project City to:(a) take allnecessary actions to minimize to the extent possible any involuntary relocation of persons, or their loss of shelter, assets, oraccess to assets, or loss of income sources or means of livelihood, temporarily or permanently ; and (ii.) implement per theResettlement Action Plan, in accordance with the Resettlement Policy Framework. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. C. 2. | Description :The Recipient shall cause each Project City to: (a) carry out itsRespective Part of the Project in accordance with the provisions of its respective Environmental Management Plan already in place;or (b) if an Environmental management Plan for a Project activity is not in place, then prepare, or cause to be prepared, anEnvironmental Management Plan (see Financing Agreement). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I. C. 3. | Description :The Recipient shall cause each of Can Tho City, Ca Mau City, RachGia City, and Tra Vinh City to carry out its Respective Part of the Project in accordance with the provisions of its respectiveEthnic Minorities Development Plan. | Frequency :Yearly
